trans-unit.source: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.
trans-unit.target: He raged at the world, at his family, at his life. But mostly he just raged.

trans-unit.source: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You get another combat phase, followed by another main phase, this turn.
trans-unit.target: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. You get another combat phase, followed by another main phase, this turn.

trans-unit.source: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: Scorching Spear deals 1 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.
trans-unit.target: Lift your spear as you might lift your glass, and toast your enemy.

trans-unit.source: Spitting Earth deals to target creature damage equal to the number of mountains you control. (Count only the mountains you have in play, including both tapped and untapped mountains.)
trans-unit.target: Spitting Earth deals to target creature damage equal to the number of mountains you control. (Count only the mountains you have in play, including both tapped and untapped mountains.)

trans-unit.source: Flying When Thunder Dragon comes into play, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: Flying When Thunder Dragon comes into play, it deals 3 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)

trans-unit.source: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them *what* to kill.
trans-unit.target: All orggs know how to kill; training teaches them *what* to kill.

trans-unit.source: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)
trans-unit.target: Tremor deals 1 damage to each creature without flying. (This includes your creatures.)

trans-unit.source: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.
trans-unit.target: One little goblin shook up the ground. When the dust cleared, no one was found.

trans-unit.source: Flying; haste (This creature may attack the turn it comes into play.)
trans-unit.target: Flying; haste (This creature may attack the turn it comes into play.)

trans-unit.source: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.
trans-unit.target: Speed and fire are always a deadly combination.

trans-unit.source: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.
trans-unit.target: Volcanic Hammer deals 3 damage to target creature or player.

trans-unit.source: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.
trans-unit.target: Fire finds its form in the heat of the forge.

trans-unit.source: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.
trans-unit.target: All creatures able to block target creature this turn do so.

trans-unit.source: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.
trans-unit.target: No earthly armor is protection against this sweetness.

trans-unit.source: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.
trans-unit.target: In its lair lies a carpet of bones.

trans-unit.source: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has an island in play.)
trans-unit.target: Islandwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has an island in play.)

trans-unit.source: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.
trans-unit.target: Stay alert: his lumbering may shake the ground itself, but in water, he glides.

trans-unit.source: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . . ."\n—*The Bible*, Mark 5:13
trans-unit.target: "And the unclean spirits went out, and entered the swine; and the herd ran violently . . . ."\n—*The Bible*, Mark 5:13

trans-unit.source: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.
trans-unit.target: They were formidable even before they learned the use of weapons.

trans-unit.source: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.
trans-unit.target: Don't worry about provoking grizzly bears; they come that way.

trans-unit.source: Lone Wolf may deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.
trans-unit.target: Lone Wolf may deal its combat damage to defending player as though it weren't blocked.

trans-unit.source: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)
trans-unit.target: Forestwalk (This creature is unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)

trans-unit.source: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.
trans-unit.target: Rarely seen, hardly heard, never caught.

trans-unit.source: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.
trans-unit.target: Target creature gets +4/+4 until end of turn.

trans-unit.source: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.
trans-unit.target: The nightstalkers' little game of tease-the-squirrel suddenly took an unexpected turn.

trans-unit.source: "I am that merry wanderer of the night."\n—William Shakespeare,\n*A Midsummer Night's Dream*
trans-unit.target: "I am that merry wanderer of the night."\n—William Shakespeare,\n*A Midsummer Night's Dream*

trans-unit.source: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.
trans-unit.target: The dying ask for water because they know it contains life.

trans-unit.source: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They're unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)
trans-unit.target: Green creatures you control gain forestwalk until end of turn. (They're unblockable as long as defending player has a forest in play.)

trans-unit.source: Search your library for a forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.
trans-unit.target: Search your library for a forest card and put that card into play. Then shuffle your library.

trans-unit.source: Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us.
trans-unit.target: Every seed planted is another lesson the forest can teach us.

trans-unit.source: Norwood Archers can block as though it had flying.
trans-unit.target: Norwood Archers can block as though it had flying.

trans-unit.source: "'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."\n—Elvish scout
trans-unit.target: "'Air superiority?' Not while our archers scan the skies."\n—Elvish scout

trans-unit.source: Shuffle any number of creature cards from your graveyard into your library.

trans-unit.source: Death just encourages life the more.
trans-unit.target: Death just encourages life the more.

trans-unit.source: His true majesty is not in his silver, but in his size.
trans-unit.target: His true majesty is not in his silver, but in his size.

trans-unit.source: Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.
trans-unit.target: Neither predator nor prey, the elephant chooses its place in the battle.

trans-unit.target: Squall deals 2 damage to each creature with flying. (This includes your creatures.)

trans-unit.source: "To-night the winds begin to rise . . . The rooks are blown about the skies . . . ."\n—Alfred, Lord Tennyson, *In Memoriam*

trans-unit.source: Put up to three land cards from your hand into play.

trans-unit.source: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.
trans-unit.target: Summer sends its kiss with warmth and blooming life.

trans-unit.source: Sylvan Yeti's power is equal to the number of cards in your hand.

trans-unit.source: The deeper the wood, the greater its strength.

trans-unit.source: It's hard to say for certain which end is more dangerous.
